content.raw:
I would say we need to add the topic  '/atlas/synchronization_statistics' to our test list. It was probably added after this pull request. It's failing both in my local machine and jenkins:

```
19: [atlas_utils.qual_task_1_rosapi/test_extra_topics][FAILURE]---------------------
19: Items in the first set but not the second:
19: '/atlas/synchronization_statistics'
```
